prompt: As a consumer, I want to be able to reduce my carbon footprint.
As a business, I want a better way to optimize resources so that I can switch to a four day work week.
As an artist, I want a better way to sell my art to interested individuals.
As a local chef, I want a way to experiment with multiple cuisines and share those experiences with customers.
As an individual with a nine-to-five job, I want a way to prevent burnout in my career.
As a college student, I want a way to get my financial life under control and have a solid understanding of where my money is going and how I can save money.
As a local business, I want to be able to reach local and regional consumers to improve foot traffic in my business.
As a commuter, I want a more efficient way to commute when I live and work in a gridlocked downtown area.
As a restaurant, I want a way to know which foods my customers like and donâ€™t like.
As part of a wedding party, I want a way to write captivating toasts and speeches.
As an entrepreneur, I want a way to share ideas and thoughts with similar individuals.
As a business, I want to receive quicker feedback on new products and market experiments.
As a consumer, I want a better way to communicate with small online businesses that I purchase goods from.
As a parent, I want to ensure my teenager learns important life skills such as how to manage your money, how to file taxes, how to maintain a household, and how to apply for jobs.
As a caring consumer, I want a better way to easily donate to the charities I care about.
As a business owner, I want to be able to show my employees that I value them with small gifts of appreciation.
As a digital nomad, I want to optimize the way I do remote work.
As a local business, I want a way to connect with other local businesses and to give each other a helping hand to mutually boost sales.
As a parent, I want a safe, fun, and engaging way for my kindergartner to learn structural engineering and building concepts.
As a working parent, I want an easy way to get healthy meals for my family that fits into my busy schedule.
As an entrepreneur, I want a better way to quickly memorialize ideas wherever I am so that I can come back to them later.
As a fitness enthusiast with a job that requires frequent, I want a portable way to maintain my healthy lifestyle.
As a household, we would like a way to easily track when certain repetitive chores or tasks are done.
As a family member with older relatives, I would like a way to stay connected with them through the pandemic.
As a consumer, I would like an easier way to garden and maintain seasonal plants that will stay alive.
